tasks.task: Trimming tree branches to stimulate bud growth at specific angles
subtasks: Observing the angle of the branch cut (45 degrees)
Understanding auxin and hormone distribution affecting growth direction
Identifying the target bud location beneath the branch tip
Cutting the branch at the correct angle to direct bud growth upward
Avoiding cuts that would convert a slanting branch into a vertical one
Pruning the branch at an outward-facing node to promote outward and upward growth
Preventing inward growth by carefully selecting the cut location
